h1: Calories in Chicken Thigh Without Skin
assumptions: Skinless, boneless chicken thigh, roasted or grilled, no added oil or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by cut, cooking method, brand, and portion size; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of skinless chicken thigh provides ~177 kcal and ~24g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in chicken thigh without skin per 100g?
faqs.a: About 177 kcal per 100g of cooked, skinless chicken thigh.

faqs.q: What's the protein in skinless chicken thigh?
Does cooking method affect calories in chicken thigh without skin?
faqs.a: Yes; grilling or roasting keeps it lower than frying, which adds fat.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in chicken thigh without skin?

faqs.q: How does skinless compare to skin-on chicken thigh calories?
faqs.a: Skinless is lower at ~177 kcal/100g; skin-on adds ~50 kcal from fat.
